workshoptitle: Configuring WebCenter Content Document Security for DMS Scenario

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to setup Document security

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Initialize WebCenter Content Marketplace Instance
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to initialize the workshop environment

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Users and Groups
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create users and groups in IDCS

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create Security Groups, Roles, Aliases and Accounts
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create groups, roles, aliases and account in wcc

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create Folders and Files and set Different Security Permissions
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to create folders and files in WCC. This lab also shows how to set different security permissions on the folder and files

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Verify Security Privilege on the Folders and Files
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to verify security privileges set on folder and files

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
